Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Card
      • model.Building
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class Building
extends Card
    Building is a class to create and handle a building card.
    See Also:

        Create a new Building with the given values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the card
        ecus - the value of ecus of the card
        score - the score of the card
        stone - the value of stone of the card
        wood - the value of wood of the card
        knowledge - the value of knowledge of the card
        tile - the value of tile of the card
